name: group_open
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community You opened a private channel  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					groups:read 				 The group_open event is sent to all connections for a user when a private group is opened by that user. This event is not available to bot user subscriptions in the Events API.
